name: Astro Jazz 9000
description:
The first ever escape room platformer (perhaps).

Description:

Android Astronaut Andy-9000 was placed in the lab on the planet GjaZz. You need to help him find his way out of each room.

Peculiarities:

  • 6 unique levels;
  • New Sound Design ;
  • New 3D models of new musical instruments;
  • Improved animation of the character (add dust when moving and landing);
  • New Scripts (Camera movement, TypeWriterEffect, Trap, Animation etc.)

Control:

Movement - WASD or Arrows 

Jump - SPACE

Pause - Esc

Credits:

Created by Roman E. Gulbrandr

Final music by @hamm_slamm

Special thanks: Ann Gry.
